job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pAetnas Member Analytics team is focused on delivering strategicallyimpactful programs and tools to help members across all life stages feel the joy of achieving their best health in their own wayppbrppThis position will be a Senior level role within the data science team to develop a world class experimentation optimization and personalization platform The candidate will work with a team of data scientists to develop analytics module with a full suite of AB testing features build machine leaning models to provide real time recommendations for users and create a self learning optimization engineppbrppWe are looking for a candidate with strong fundamentals in statistics and causal inference The ideal candidate would have a graduate degree in Statistics and academic or industry experience as an applied statisticianppbrppThis is a unique opportunity to work on new transformation initiatives with CVS Health as a result of the recent company mergerppbrppFundamental Componentspp Mentoring and collaborationppo Collaborates with other data scientists champions 360feedback across teamppo Motivates team members and probes into technical detailpp Experience with AB testing and ETLppo Apply and innovate with statistical methods to reduce the time and data volume needed to draw reliable conclusions from experimental changes to the productppo Create features and build ETL pipelines as an input for data science modelpp Design and develop causal inference models descriptive and predictive modelsppo Conduct deep dives evaluate scenarios and potential future outcomes using statistical and ML modelsppo Develop proofofconcepts and prototypes as necessary to showcase new models and analytical offerings to partners and customerpp Stakeholder managementppo Consults with business partners to understand problems and goals understand business value and translate into business opportunities to be captured through predictive analytics solutionsppbrppRequired Qualificationspp3 years of experience in statistical data analysis model evaluation ETL and building machine learning models or research experience in an academic settingppbrppExperience with big data using Spark Hadoop and HiveppbrppExpertise in using R or Python and PySpark to manipulate large data sets and develop statistical modelsppbrppPreferred QualificationsppSuperior skills to effectively communicate technical ideas and results to nontechnical clients in written and verbal formppbrpp4 years experience in statistical data analysis model evaluation ETL and building machine learning models or research experience in the an academic settingppbrppExperience with big data using Spark Hadoop and HiveppbrppHave a strong understanding of experiment design and advance methodologies to run more experiments and get results faster without compromising data qualityppbrppExpertise in using R Python PySpark to manipulate large data sets and develop statistical modelsppbrppExcellent problem solving skills critical thinking and conceptual thinking abilitiesppbrppSuperior skills to effectively communicate technical ideas and results to nontechnical clients in written and verbal formppbrppExcellent problem solving skills critical thinking and conceptual thinking abilitiesppbrppEducationppBachelors Degree in related fieldppbrppBusiness OverviewppAt CVS Health we are joined in a common purpose helping people on their path to better health We are working to transform health care through innovations that make quality care more accessible easier to use less expensive and patientfocused Working together and organizing around the individual we are pioneering a new approach to total health that puts people at the heartppbrppWe strive to promote and sustain a culture of diversity inclusion and belonging every day CVS Health is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer We do not discriminate in recruiting hiring or promotion based on race ethnicity sexgender sexual orientation gender identity or expression age disability or protected veteran status or on any other basis or characteristic prohibited by applicable federal state or local law We proudly support and encourage people with military experience active veterans reservists and National Guard as well as military spouses to apply for CVS Health job opportunitiesppp
